mapper.select: select info.id, date_format(info.start_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') startTime, date_format(info.end_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') endTime, info.remark remark, info.name schedultMatter, info.callon_address callonAddress, info.created_id createdId, con.id contactId, con.name contactName, con.post contactPost, con.phone1 contactPhone, con.company contactCompany, project.id projectId, project.project_name projectName, dct1.name industryOwnName, dct2.name financeStatusName, info.significance significanceId, dct3.name significanceName, info.wakeup_id wakeupId, sd.name wakeupTime, sf.file_key fileKey, sf.file_length fileLength, sf.bucket_name bucketName, sf.file_name fileName, inre.view_notes viewNotes, inre.id talkRecordId from schedule_info info left join schedule_contacts con on info.callon_person=con.id left join sop_project project on info.project_type=1 and info.project_id=project.id left join dict dct1 on dct1.parent_code='industryOwn' and dct1.dict_code=project.industry_own left join dict dct2 on dct2.parent_code='financeStatus' and dct2.dict_code=project.finance_status left join dict dct3 on dct3.parent_code='significance' and dct3.dict_value=info.significance left join schedule_dict sd on sd.id = info.wakeup_id left join sop_interview_record inre on inre.schedule_id=info.id left join sop_file sf on sf.id=inre.file_id where info.id=#{id} ORDER BY inre.created_time desc;
select dict.parent_code parentCode, dict.name, dict.dict_value dictValue from dict dict where dict.parent_code ='significance';
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sop_interview_record WHERE schedule_id in (SELECT id FROM schedule_info WHERE callon_person=#{conId});
